title: Can't change my e-mail address in my account settings
body:
I can't change my e-mail in my profile settings because the e-mail that this account is on got deleted. 
                        Can  someone help me please?

replies.body: We'd like to help with your specific issue individually!  Hit us up in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account team can get you updated and good to go!  We'll respond as soon as possible!
